scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, cloaked in blue and holding the Christ Child, riding on a donkey. Joseph, wearing a red cap and a pink tunic, leads the donkey by a rope. They are shown in an outdoor setting with green ground and sparse vegetation. Behind them is an architectural element resembling a decorative screen or window with a gold lattice pattern against a black background, framed by an arched border adorned with floral motifs.
